title: EPISTOLA Samuel Hankin
html:
EPISTOLA Samuel Hankin

Dear Editor:

In the Winter 2000 edition at page 30 in your “Epistolae” section, you published a letter from Naftali Wertheim inquiring as to proofreading. Unfortunately, you have failed to correct an error in Mr. Behling's letter at line four: “I have encountered them for/or many years.” Nor do you include a “sic,” which you could have borrowed from the next column, “Sic! Sic! Sic!”

[Samuel Hankin, Gainesville, Florida]

[A sic-worthy error, but it is ours, not Mr. Behling's!—Ed.]
